description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
List of supported platforms by this release: System RequirementsWhat's Changed

- [stable-3.15] Bugfix/elidedtext by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7706

- [stable-3.15] add a simple github action workflow to build test the documentation by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7709
- [stable-3.15] Fix filename of fix-macosvfs-file-sharing.png by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7712
- [stable-3.15] Fix .netrc parsing by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7714
- [stable-3.15] Bugfix/do not always free up storage windows shortcuts by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7715
- [stable-3.15] fix dev application name to keep a consitant migration behaviour for the dev and prod build by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7722
- [stable-3.15] ensure proper read write access to root folder and db files by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#7726
